titleStmt.title: To the supream authority of England, the representors of the people in Parliament assembled; the humble petition of Richard Overton, late prisoner in Newgate by the House of Lords, in behalf of himself and other Commoners that have suffered under their prerogative jurisdiction.
titleStmt.author: Overton, Richard, fl. 1646.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
